inputs.name: job_inputs
inputs.label: Job Inputs
inputs.desc: Folder containing at least a generator.sh script and if needed supporting files for jobs to run.

parameters.name: custom_modules
parameters.label: Custom Modules
parameters.desc: Custom tacc modules required for jobs to be execued. Will override default.

parameters.name: pylauncher_input
parameters.label: Pylauncher Input Filename
parameters.desc: Name of input file for pylauncher (.json or .csv supported). Defaults to jobs_list.csv.

parameters.name: generator_args
parameters.label: Generator Arguments
parameters.desc: Argument string to pass as extra arguments to every call to generator script.
